snippet: Michael Dunn, who is accused of fatally shooting a Jacksonville teenager, says a shotgun was pointed at him, but the police have not found such a weapon.
abstract: Case against Michael Dunn, who is accused of fatally shooting Jacksonville teenager Jordan Davis at convenience store, hinges over shotgun; Dunn says one of people in Davis's car threatened him with a shotgun, but police have not found such a weapon.
lead_paragraph: Michael Dunn, who is accused of fatally shooting a Jacksonville teenager, says a shotgun was pointed at him, but the police have not found such a weapon.

headline.seo: Shotgun Report Central in Florida Shooting Case
headline.main: Shotgun Report at Center of Florida Shooting Case
headline.print_headline: Shotgun Report at Center Of Florida Shooting Case
